Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • HUD
        • Button

  • public class Button
extends HUD
    A generic button for a game or other application.
    Version:
    1 on 11/25/2017
    Author:
    Ed Parrish

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Button()
      Creates a button with default text and settings.
      Button(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a button with the specified text and default settings.

      Constructs a button of the specified size with black text on a transparent background.

      Constructs a button of the specified size and text color.
      Button(java.lang.String text, int textSize, greenfoot.Color textColor, Button.Style type)
      Constructs a button of the specified size and text color on a transparent background.
